message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,750,000. It's a great deal for you, considering its value. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $1,400,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,600,000. This still gives you a good deal, and I believe we can close the deal at this price.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,500,000 is too high. I'm willing to pay $1,450,000. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me here.
